name: Overwatch: Game of the Year Edition
summary:
REQUIRES XBOX LIVE GOLD. SOLD SEPARATELY.

Join us for a FREE weekend of Overwatch beginning November 17! You’ll have access to all of the maps and heroes in a variety of game modes. The Overwatch Free Weekend begins November 17 at 11:00 a.m. PT and ends November 20 at 11:59 p.m. PT. Any experience or items you earn during this free weekend will transfer over if you decide to purchase Overwatch: Game of the Year Edition; just be sure you purchase the game on the same Xbox Live Gold membership you played with during this free weekend.

Clash on the battlefields of tomorrow and choose your hero from a diverse cast of soldiers, scientists, adventurers, and oddities. Bend time, defy physics, and unleash a dizzying array of extraordinary powers and weapons. Engage your enemies in iconic locations from around the globe in the ultimate team-based shooter.

The world needs heroes—we hope you can join us!
